name: Base64 Encoder/Decoder
details: Encode and decode Base64 strings with ease. This tool helps you convert text to Base64 format and vice versa, useful for data encoding and security analysis.

name: URL Redirect Analyzer
details: Analyze and track URL redirects. This tool helps you follow and analyze URL redirection chains, useful for security research and phishing analysis.

name: IOC Extractor - IP,Email...
details: Extract and analyze Indicators of Compromise. This tool helps you identify and extract potential security indicators from text, useful for threat intelligence and security analysis.

name: Security Resources
details: Access comprehensive cybersecurity resources. This tool provides a curated collection of security tools, platforms, and educational resources for cybersecurity professionals.

name: Todo List Manager
details: Manage and track your tasks with this interactive todo list manager. Create, edit, and organize tasks with due dates, owners, and detailed information.

name: Log Analyzer
details: Analyze log files with advanced filtering and keyword highlighting. Upload logs to visualize errors, warnings, and important information with color-coded highlighting and powerful search capabilities.
